scripts.postinstall-publish-submodule: echo --Install publish submodule /posix commands used/-- && sh ./utils/publish-init.sh
scripts.start: echo --Run development server-- && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_DEV=DEVSERVER next dev
scripts.next-build-demo: echo --Make demo build-- && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_DEMO=yes next dev && next build
scripts.build-and-export: echo --Make demo build and export package-- && npm-run-all next-build next-export patch-build
scripts.build-and-export-demo: echo --Make demo build and export demo package-- && npm-run-all next-build-demo next-export patch-build
scripts.build: echo --Make build and export package-- && npm-run-all check-all build-and-export
scripts.build-demo: echo --Make build and export package-- && npm-run-all check-all build-and-export-demo
scripts.build-only: echo --Make build and export package /without chekups/-- && npm-run-all build-and-export
scripts.build-only-demo: echo --Make build and export package /without chekups/-- && npm-run-all build-and-export-demo
scripts.build-and-publish: echo --Build and publish-- && npm-run-all build publish
scripts.build-only-and-publish: echo --Build and publish /without chekups/-- && npm-run-all build-only publish
scripts.serve-build: echo --Serve build /at alternate port 3003/-- && serve build -l 3003
scripts.test-all: echo --Run all lint & test tasks-- && npm-run-all lint type-check test && echo --All tests passed--
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all pre-commit check-ups-- && npm-run-all prettier stylelint lint type-check && echo --All check-ups passed--
scripts.lint: echo --Lint sources-- && eslint src --ext ts --ext tsx --ext js
scripts.update-browserslist: echo --Update browsers list for caniuse-- && npx update-browserslist-db@latest
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
